Utterance: <sync>
Hi there! Welcome back. How have you been since our last session?
Hi! I’ve been okay. I’ve been trying to practice mindfulness, like we talked about.
That’s fantastic! How has it been going for you?
I’ve been doing it most mornings, and it helps set a better tone for my day.
That’s great to hear! Have you noticed any changes in your anxiety levels since starting this practice?
I think so. I feel a bit more grounded and less reactive to stress.
That’s wonderful progress! What situations have you noticed it helping you with the most?
Mostly when I’m feeling overwhelmed at work or when I’m out in public.
Those are significant triggers. It sounds like you’re really using the tools we’ve discussed. Have you had any challenges with the practice?
Sometimes I forget to do it, especially on busy days.
That’s completely normal. Would setting a reminder help you remember?
Yeah, I could set an alarm on my phone.
That’s a great idea! Consistency can really help reinforce the habit. Now, how about your goal of exploring sex education? Have you made any progress?
I found a couple of workshops that I’m interested in, but I haven’t signed up yet.
That’s a good step! What’s holding you back from signing up?
I guess I’m still feeling unsure about whether it’s the right fit for me.
It’s okay to feel uncertain. What can you do to explore that uncertainty further?
Maybe I could reach out to the organizers and ask questions about what to expect.
That sounds like a proactive approach! Gathering information can help you feel more confident in your decision.
I think I’ll do that.
Great! Let’s set a timeline for that. How about aiming to reach out by the end of this week?
That works for me.
Excellent! Let’s check in on that in our next session. Now, how have things been with your boyfriend since our last talk?
We’ve been doing well! We’ve been more open with each other, and it feels good.
That’s wonderful! What specific changes have you noticed in your conversations?
We’re not just talking about problems; we’re also sharing positive things and making plans together.
That’s a healthy balance! It sounds like you’re both fostering a deeper connection. How does that make you feel?
It makes me feel really happy and secure in our relationship.
That’s fantastic! Building that security is so important. Have you discussed any future plans or goals as a couple?
We talked about going on a trip together, which we’re both excited about.
That sounds like a great opportunity to bond! What kind of trip are you planning?
We’re thinking about a weekend getaway to the beach.
That sounds lovely! Have you both discussed how you want to spend your time there?
We want to relax, maybe do some hiking, and just enjoy each other’s company.
That sounds perfect! It’s important to have that time together. How do you feel about planning this trip?
I’m excited! It’ll be nice to take a break from everything.
Absolutely! Taking time for yourselves can recharge your relationship. Have you thought about any activities you’d like to do while there?
I’d love to go for a sunset walk on the beach and maybe try some local food.
Those sound like wonderful ideas! It’s great to plan enjoyable experiences together. Now, is there anything else on your mind today?
I think we’ve covered everything. I feel good about my goals and the progress I’m making.
I’m so glad to hear that! Remember to be gentle with yourself as you navigate these changes. Let’s touch base again next week and see how everything is going.
Sounds good! Thank you for your support.
You’re welcome! Take care, and I look forward to our next session.
Bye!
